item.title: AhNPR3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Arahy.R60CUW Gene Symbol: AhNPR3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Arachis hypogaea Functional Descriptions: AhNPR3 regulates the expression of WRKY and PR genes, and mediates the immune response of the peanut.

item.title: MtREV1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr2g094520 Gene Symbol: MtREV1|PPF1 Gene Name: REVOLUTA1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Detailed characterization revealed that a lesion in a HD-ZIPIII gene, REVOLUTA (MtREV1|PPF1), resulted in the defects of the mutant.
